PolicyArn.markdownDescription:
Arn of the policy 

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^arn:aws(-[^:]+)?:bedrock:[a-z0-9-]{1,20}:[0-9]{12}:automated-reasoning-policy\/[a-z0-9]{12}$  
Update requires: No interruption

Name.description: The name inherited from the policy
Name.markdownDescription:
The name inherited from the policy

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^[0-9a-zA-Z-_ ]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Description.description: The description inherited from the policy
Description.markdownDescription:
The description inherited from the policy

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 1024  
Pattern: ^[\s\S]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Version.markdownDescription:
The version of the policy

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 12  
Pattern: ^([1-9][0-9]{0,11})$  
Update requires: No interruption

DefinitionHash.markdownDescription:
The hash for this version

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 128  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^[0-9a-z]{128}$  
Update requires: No interruption

CreatedAt.description: Time this policy version was created
CreatedAt.markdownDescription:
Time this policy version was created

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

UpdatedAt.description: Time this policy was last updated
UpdatedAt.markdownDescription:
Time this policy was last updated

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

PolicyId.description: The id of the associated policy
PolicyId.markdownDescription:
The id of the associated policy

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^[a-z0-9]{12}$  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.description: Definition of the key/value pair for a tag

Key.markdownDescription:
Tag Key

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9\s._:/=+@-]*$  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.markdownDescription:
Tag Value

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9\s._:/=+@-]*$  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
Definition of the key/value pair for a tag

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Tags.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption
